Introduce-Myself: 嗨, 我是 劉宗勲!
BaseOn: 目前住在加拿大的溫哥華
AboutMe-Part1: Hi, 嗨My name is Tsung-Hsun, or call me Quien. I have a 1+ years of experience in Android app development using Java and 4+ years of experience in Web development, and learned iOS development with Swift for 1 year.
AboutMe-Part2: Coding is a passion for me, not just a job. Although the journey has not been easy, I am proud to have overcome every challenge that came my way. My passion for coding has never wavered, and I remain committed to pursuing new challenges to further enhance my skills and knowledge.
AboutMe-Part3: I have wide range of hobbies and passions. From reading, playing sports, running, traveling. I am always seeking new experiences and love to keep myself engaged and learning new things.
Detail0: 作為一個自由職業者跟我們的外包團隊,我的任務是維護管理者網站使網站更人性化, 資料庫處理速度更快, 以及 Android 手機軟體開發.
Detail1: 大禾資訊是一間開發商業軟體公司, 像是企業ERP系統, POS系統, 財務會計系統等等. 我主要負責是幫忙公司把現有的系統網站優化的更人性化與提高資料庫處理速度.
Position2: 實習 Android 開發工程師
Detail2: 康曜資訊是一間軟體公司, 我主要負責幫公司開發新的Android手機軟體以及維護現有的網站.
Description1: Chatwis 是個基於 ChatGPT API 構建的手機軟體並使用 openai 技術和 gpt-3 模型.
